com.softa.babywatch.detectors
Interface BabyDetector

public interface BabyDetector

Interface for implementing a noise detector for babies

Author:
anderssvensson

Method Detail

updateState

com.softa.babywatch.BabyState updateState(double average)
Update the current state of the baby detector.

Parameters:
average - is the average for the absolute values measure during the last samples read to the buffer
Returns:
the current state of the detector

getBackgroundLevel

short getBackgroundLevel()
Gets the current level of the background noise.

Returns:
a short value between 0 and 32767
